entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -20.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 06:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -20.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -22.9°C
Wind: N 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
